name: Game Show of Death
description:
Discord  I YouTube

Urban exploring gone wrong, Shay and his crew trapped in a game show where the contestants must get the prize through dangerous and life-threatening obstacle. 

Game Show Of Death is a platformer game where your need to evade all dangerous obstacles to get the prize. The prize is precious more than your life, it can also change the world.

Credits
3D Artist & Programmer

Pirangunter21

2D Artists 

Office Printer, Logangreenjeans, Blake

Voice Actor 

Jake Holte

System Requirement MinimumRecommended OS : Windows 7/10 (64-bit version)OS : Windows 7/10 (64-bit version)Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or betterProcessor: Intel Core i7-3770/AMD FX-8350 or betterMemory: 4 GB RAMMemory: 8GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA GT 720M or betterGraphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 or better

The game is based on the works of the SCP Foundation community.
